metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000069 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
FreePlane version 1.5.9 and earlier contains a XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in XML Parser in mindmap loader that can result in stealing data from victim's machine. This attack appears to require the victim to open a specially crafted mind map file. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 1.6+.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-1000069` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freeplane - 1.6.6-1
freeplane-scripting-api - 1.6.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freeplane package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.6-1').
